Enhance your food packaging with Custom Waterproof FDA-Compliant Nutrition Facts Labels. These premium, durable stickers are designed for food producers, meal prep businesses, and small brands seeking reliable and professional labeling solutions. FDA Compliant: Meets all federal requirements for nutrition labeling, ensuring your products are market-ready and trustworthy. Waterproof & Durable: Made to withstand moisture, oil, and frequent handling, keeping your labels sharp and legible. Fully Customizable: Add your logo, brand colors, and specific nutrition data for a unique, professional presentation. Versatile Sizing: Ideal for jars, bottles, containers, meal prep packaging, and more. Easy Application: Peel-and-stick design enables quick, bubble-free placement on any surface.
